price: Tàbí wọn kò mọ Òjíṣẹ́ wọn mọ́ ni wọ́n fi di alátakò rẹ̀?
arabic: أَمۡ لَمۡ يَعۡرِفُواْ رَسُولَهُمۡ فَهُمۡ لَهُۥ مُنكِرُونَ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: am lam yaʿrifū rasūlahum fahum lahu munkirūna
